00030 #define ARG(argname, argtype) get_arg<argtype>(argname, env, sig, pstate, backtrace)
00031 #define ARGR(argname, argtype, lo, hi) get_arg_r(argname, env, sig, pstate, lo, hi, backtrace)
00032 #define ARGM(argname, argtype, ctx) get_arg_m(argname, env, sig, pstate, backtrace, ctx)

00038   Definition* make_native_function(Signature sig, Native_Function func, Context& ctx)
00039   {
00040     Parser sig_parser = Parser::from_c_str(sig, ctx, ParserState("[built-in function]"));
00041     sig_parser.lex<Prelexer::identifier>();
00042     string name(Util::normalize_underscores(sig_parser.lexed));
00043     Parameters* params = sig_parser.parse_parameters();
00044     return new (ctx.mem) Definition(ParserState("[built-in function]"),
00045                                     sig,
00046                                     name,
00047                                     params,
00048                                     func,
00049                                     &ctx,
00050                                     false);
00051   }
00052 
00053   Definition* make_c_function(Sass_Function_Entry c_func, Context& ctx)
00054   {
00055     const char* sig = sass_function_get_signature(c_func);
00056     Parser sig_parser = Parser::from_c_str(sig, ctx, ParserState("[c function]"));
00057     // allow to overload generic callback plus @warn, @error and @debug with custom functions
00058     sig_parser.lex < alternatives < identifier, exactly <'*'>,
00059                                     exactly < Constants::warn_kwd >,
00060                                     exactly < Constants::error_kwd >,
00061                                     exactly < Constants::debug_kwd >
00062                    >              >();
00063     string name(Util::normalize_underscores(sig_parser.lexed));
00064     Parameters* params = sig_parser.parse_parameters();
00065     return new (ctx.mem) Definition(ParserState("[c function]"),
00066                                     sig,
00067                                     name,
00068                                     params,
00069                                     c_func,
00070                                     &ctx,
00071                                     false, true);
00072   }

00076     template <typename T>
00077     T* get_arg(const string& argname, Env& env, Signature sig, ParserState pstate, Backtrace* backtrace)
00078     {
00079       // Minimal error handling -- the expectation is that built-ins will be written correctly!
00080       T* val = dynamic_cast<T*>(env[argname]);
00081       if (!val) {
00082         string msg("argument `");
00083         msg += argname;
00084         msg += "` of `";
00085         msg += sig;
00086         msg += "` must be a ";
00087         msg += T::type_name();
00088         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00089       }
00090       return val;
00091     }
00092 
00093     Map* get_arg_m(const string& argname, Env& env, Signature sig, ParserState pstate, Backtrace* backtrace, Context& ctx)
00094     {
00095       // Minimal error handling -- the expectation is that built-ins will be written correctly!
00096       Map* val = dynamic_cast<Map*>(env[argname]);
00097       if (val) return val;
00098 
00099       List* lval = dynamic_cast<List*>(env[argname]);
00100       if (lval && lval->length() == 0) return new (ctx.mem) Map(pstate, 0);
00101 
00102       // fallback on get_arg for error handling
00103       val = get_arg<Map>(argname, env, sig, pstate, backtrace);
00104       return val;
00105     }
00106 
00107     Number* get_arg_r(const string& argname, Env& env, Signature sig, ParserState pstate, double lo, double hi, Backtrace* backtrace)
00108     {
00109       // Minimal error handling -- the expectation is that built-ins will be written correctly!
00110       Number* val = get_arg<Number>(argname, env, sig, pstate, backtrace);
00111       double v = val->value();
00112       if (!(lo <= v && v <= hi)) {
00113         stringstream msg;
00114         msg << "argument `" << argname << "` of `" << sig << "` must be between ";
00115         msg << lo << " and " << hi;
00116         error(msg.str(), pstate, backtrace);
00117       }
00118       return val;
00119     }

00121 #ifdef __MINGW32__
00122     uint64_t GetSeed()
00123     {
00124       HCRYPTPROV hp = 0;
00125       BYTE rb[8];
00126       CryptAcquireContext(&hp, 0, 0, PROV_RSA_FULL, CRYPT_VERIFYCONTEXT);
00127       CryptGenRandom(hp, sizeof(rb), rb);
00128       CryptReleaseContext(hp, 0);
00129 
00130       uint64_t seed;
00131       memcpy(&seed, &rb[0], sizeof(seed));
00132 
00133       return seed;
00134     }
00135 #else
00136     static random_device rd;
00137     uint64_t GetSeed()
00138     {
00139           return rd();
00140         }
00141 #endif
00142 
00143     // note: the performance of many  implementations of
00144     // random_device degrades sharply once the entropy pool
00145     // is exhausted. For practical use, random_device is
00146     // generally only used to seed a PRNG such as mt19937.
00147     static mt19937 rand(static_cast<unsigned int>(GetSeed()));

00160     inline double color_num(Number* n) {
00161       if (n->unit() == "%") {
00162         return std::min(std::max(n->value(), 0.0), 1.0) * 255;
00163       } else {
00164         return std::min(std::max(n->value(), 0.0), 255.0);
00165       }
00166     }

00209     Signature mix_sig = "mix($color-1, $color-2, $weight: 50%)";
00210     BUILT_IN(mix)
00211     {
00212       Color*  color1 = ARG("$color-1", Color);
00213       Color*  color2 = ARG("$color-2", Color);
00214       Number* weight = ARGR("$weight", Number, 0, 100);
00215 
00216       double p = weight->value()/100;
00217       double w = 2*p - 1;
00218       double a = color1->a() - color2->a();
00219 
00220       double w1 = (((w * a == -1) ? w : (w + a)/(1 + w*a)) + 1)/2.0;
00221       double w2 = 1 - w1;
00222 
00223       return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00224                                  std::round(w1*color1->r() + w2*color2->r()),
00225                                  std::round(w1*color1->g() + w2*color2->g()),
00226                                  std::round(w1*color1->b() + w2*color2->b()),
00227                                  color1->a()*p + color2->a()*(1-p));
00228     }

00231     // HSL FUNCTIONS
00233 
00234     // RGB to HSL helper function
00235     struct HSL { double h; double s; double l; };
00236     HSL rgb_to_hsl(double r, double g, double b)
00237     {
00238 
00239       // Algorithm from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/wHSL_and_HSV#Conversion_from_RGB_to_HSL_or_HSV
00240       r /= 255.0; g /= 255.0; b /= 255.0;
00241 
00242       double max = std::max(r, std::max(g, b));
00243       double min = std::min(r, std::min(g, b));
00244       double del = max - min;
00245 
00246       double h = 0, s = 0, l = (max + min) / 2.0;
00247 
00248       if (max == min) {
00249         h = s = 0; // achromatic
00250       }
00251       else {
00252         if (l < 0.5) s = del / (max + min);
00253         else         s = del / (2.0 - max - min);
00254 
00255         if      (r == max) h = (g - b) / del + (g < b ? 6 : 0);
00256         else if (g == max) h = (b - r) / del + 2;
00257         else if (b == max) h = (r - g) / del + 4;
00258       }
00259 
00260       HSL hsl_struct;
00261       hsl_struct.h = h / 6 * 360;
00262       hsl_struct.s = s * 100;
00263       hsl_struct.l = l * 100;
00264 
00265       return hsl_struct;
00266     }
00267 
00268     // hue to RGB helper function
00269     double h_to_rgb(double m1, double m2, double h) {
00270       if (h < 0) h += 1;
00271       if (h > 1) h -= 1;
00272       if (h*6.0 < 1) return m1 + (m2 - m1)*h*6;
00273       if (h*2.0 < 1) return m2;
00274       if (h*3.0 < 2) return m1 + (m2 - m1) * (2.0/3.0 - h)*6;
00275       return m1;
00276     }
00277 
00278     Color* hsla_impl(double h, double s, double l, double a, Context& ctx, ParserState pstate)
00279     {
00280       h /= 360.0;
00281       s /= 100.0;
00282       l /= 100.0;
00283 
00284       if (l < 0) l = 0;
00285       if (s < 0) s = 0;
00286       if (l > 1) l = 1;
00287       if (s > 1) s = 1;
00288       while (h < 0) h += 1;
00289       while (h > 1) h -= 1;
00290 
00291       // Algorithm from the CSS3 spec: http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#hsl-color.
00292       double m2;
00293       if (l <= 0.5) m2 = l*(s+1.0);
00294       else m2 = (l+s)-(l*s);
00295       double m1 = (l*2.0)-m2;
00296       // round the results -- consider moving this into the Color constructor
00297       double r = (h_to_rgb(m1, m2, h+1.0/3.0) * 255.0);
00298       double g = (h_to_rgb(m1, m2, h) * 255.0);
00299       double b = (h_to_rgb(m1, m2, h-1.0/3.0) * 255.0);
00300 
00301       return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate, r, g, b, a);
00302     }

00417     Signature saturate_sig = "saturate($color, $amount: false)";
00418     BUILT_IN(saturate)
00419     {
00420       // CSS3 filter function overload: pass literal through directly
00421       Number* amount = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$amount"]);
00422       if (!amount) {
00423         To_String to_string(&ctx);
00424         return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, "saturate(" + env["$color"]->perform(&to_string) + ")");
00425       }
00426 
00427       ARGR("$amount", Number, 0, 100);
00428       Color* rgb_color = ARG("$color", Color);
00429       HSL hsl_color = rgb_to_hsl(rgb_color->r(),
00430                                  rgb_color->g(),
00431                                  rgb_color->b());
00432 
00433       double hslcolorS = hsl_color.s + amount->value();
00434 
00435       // Saturation cannot be below 0 or above 100
00436       if (hslcolorS < 0) {
00437         hslcolorS = 0;
00438       }
00439       if (hslcolorS > 100) {
00440         hslcolorS = 100;
00441       }
00442 
00443       return hsla_impl(hsl_color.h,
00444                        hslcolorS,
00445                        hsl_color.l,
00446                        rgb_color->a(),
00447                        ctx,
00448                        pstate);
00449     }

00555     Signature opacify_sig = "opacify($color, $amount)";
00556     Signature fade_in_sig = "fade-in($color, $amount)";
00557     BUILT_IN(opacify)
00558     {
00559       Color* color = ARG("$color", Color);
00560       double amount = ARGR("$amount", Number, 0, 1)->value();
00561       double alpha = std::min(color->a() + amount, 1.0);
00562       return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00563                                  color->r(),
00564                                  color->g(),
00565                                  color->b(),
00566                                  alpha);

00569     Signature transparentize_sig = "transparentize($color, $amount)";
00570     Signature fade_out_sig = "fade-out($color, $amount)";
00571     BUILT_IN(transparentize)
00572     {
00573       Color* color = ARG("$color", Color);
00574       double amount = ARGR("$amount", Number, 0, 1)->value();
00575       double alpha = std::max(color->a() - amount, 0.0);
00576       return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00577                                  color->r(),
00578                                  color->g(),
00579                                  color->b(),
00580                                  alpha);

00587     Signature adjust_color_sig = "adjust-color($color, $red: false, $green: false, $blue: false, $hue: false, $saturation: false, $lightness: false, $alpha: false)";
00588     BUILT_IN(adjust_color)
00589     {
00590       Color* color = ARG("$color", Color);
00591       Number* r = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$red"]);
00592       Number* g = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$green"]);
00593       Number* b = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$blue"]);
00594       Number* h = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$hue"]);
00595       Number* s = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$saturation"]);
00596       Number* l = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$lightness"]);
00597       Number* a = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$alpha"]);
00598 
00599       bool rgb = r || g || b;
00600       bool hsl = h || s || l;
00601 
00602       if (rgb && hsl) {
00603         error("cannot specify both RGB and HSL values for `adjust-color`", pstate);
00604       }
00605       if (rgb) {
00606         return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00607                                    color->r() + (r ? r->value() : 0),
00608                                    color->g() + (g ? g->value() : 0),
00609                                    color->b() + (b ? b->value() : 0),
00610                                    color->a() + (a ? a->value() : 0));
00611       }
00612       if (hsl) {
00613         HSL hsl_struct = rgb_to_hsl(color->r(), color->g(), color->b());
00614         return hsla_impl(hsl_struct.h + (h ? h->value() : 0),
00615                          hsl_struct.s + (s ? s->value() : 0),
00616                          hsl_struct.l + (l ? l->value() : 0),
00617                          color->a() + (a ? a->value() : 0),
00618                          ctx,
00619                          pstate);
00620       }
00621       if (a) {
00622         return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00623                                    color->r(),
00624                                    color->g(),
00625                                    color->b(),
00626                                    color->a() + (a ? a->value() : 0));
00627       }
00628       error("not enough arguments for `adjust-color`", pstate);
00629       // unreachable
00630       return color;
00631     }
00632 
00633     Signature scale_color_sig = "scale-color($color, $red: false, $green: false, $blue: false, $hue: false, $saturation: false, $lightness: false, $alpha: false)";
00634     BUILT_IN(scale_color)
00635     {
00636       Color* color = ARG("$color", Color);
00637       Number* r = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$red"]);
00638       Number* g = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$green"]);
00639       Number* b = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$blue"]);
00640       Number* h = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$hue"]);
00641       Number* s = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$saturation"]);
00642       Number* l = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$lightness"]);
00643       Number* a = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$alpha"]);
00644 
00645       bool rgb = r || g || b;
00646       bool hsl = h || s || l;
00647 
00648       if (rgb && hsl) {
00649         error("cannot specify both RGB and HSL values for `scale-color`", pstate);
00650       }
00651       if (rgb) {
00652         double rscale = (r ? ARGR("$red",   Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00653         double gscale = (g ? ARGR("$green", Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00654         double bscale = (b ? ARGR("$blue",  Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00655         double ascale = (a ? ARGR("$alpha", Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00656         return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00657                                    color->r() + rscale * (rscale > 0.0 ? 255 - color->r() : color->r()),
00658                                    color->g() + gscale * (gscale > 0.0 ? 255 - color->g() : color->g()),
00659                                    color->b() + bscale * (bscale > 0.0 ? 255 - color->b() : color->b()),
00660                                    color->a() + ascale * (ascale > 0.0 ? 1.0 - color->a() : color->a()));
00661       }
00662       if (hsl) {
00663         double hscale = (h ? ARGR("$hue",        Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00664         double sscale = (s ? ARGR("$saturation", Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00665         double lscale = (l ? ARGR("$lightness",  Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00666         double ascale = (a ? ARGR("$alpha",      Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00667         HSL hsl_struct = rgb_to_hsl(color->r(), color->g(), color->b());
00668         hsl_struct.h += hscale * (hscale > 0.0 ? 360.0 - hsl_struct.h : hsl_struct.h);
00669         hsl_struct.s += sscale * (sscale > 0.0 ? 100.0 - hsl_struct.s : hsl_struct.s);
00670         hsl_struct.l += lscale * (lscale > 0.0 ? 100.0 - hsl_struct.l : hsl_struct.l);
00671         double alpha = color->a() + ascale * (ascale > 0.0 ? 1.0 - color->a() : color->a());
00672         return hsla_impl(hsl_struct.h, hsl_struct.s, hsl_struct.l, alpha, ctx, pstate);
00673       }
00674       if (a) {
00675         double ascale = (a ? ARGR("$alpha", Number, -100.0, 100.0)->value() : 0.0) / 100.0;
00676         return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00677                                    color->r(),
00678                                    color->g(),
00679                                    color->b(),
00680                                    color->a() + ascale * (ascale > 0.0 ? 1.0 - color->a() : color->a()));
00681       }
00682       error("not enough arguments for `scale-color`", pstate);
00683       // unreachable
00684       return color;
00685     }

00687     Signature change_color_sig = "change-color($color, $red: false, $green: false, $blue: false, $hue: false, $saturation: false, $lightness: false, $alpha: false)";
00688     BUILT_IN(change_color)
00689     {
00690       Color* color = ARG("$color", Color);
00691       Number* r = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$red"]);
00692       Number* g = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$green"]);
00693       Number* b = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$blue"]);
00694       Number* h = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$hue"]);
00695       Number* s = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$saturation"]);
00696       Number* l = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$lightness"]);
00697       Number* a = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$alpha"]);
00698 
00699       bool rgb = r || g || b;
00700       bool hsl = h || s || l;
00701 
00702       if (rgb && hsl) {
00703         error("cannot specify both RGB and HSL values for `change-color`", pstate);
00704       }
00705       if (rgb) {
00706         return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00707                                    r ? ARGR("$red",   Number, 0, 255)->value() : color->r(),
00708                                    g ? ARGR("$green", Number, 0, 255)->value() : color->g(),
00709                                    b ? ARGR("$blue",  Number, 0, 255)->value() : color->b(),
00710                                    a ? ARGR("$alpha", Number, 0, 255)->value() : color->a());
00711       }
00712       if (hsl) {
00713         HSL hsl_struct = rgb_to_hsl(color->r(), color->g(), color->b());
00714         if (h) hsl_struct.h = static_cast<double>(((static_cast<int>(h->value()) % 360) + 360) % 360) / 360.0;
00715         if (s) hsl_struct.s = ARGR("$saturation", Number, 0, 100)->value();
00716         if (l) hsl_struct.l = ARGR("$lightness",  Number, 0, 100)->value();
00717         double alpha = a ? ARGR("$alpha", Number, 0, 1.0)->value() : color->a();
00718         return hsla_impl(hsl_struct.h, hsl_struct.s, hsl_struct.l, alpha, ctx, pstate);
00719       }
00720       if (a) {
00721         double alpha = a ? ARGR("$alpha", Number, 0, 1.0)->value() : color->a();
00722         return new (ctx.mem) Color(pstate,
00723                                    color->r(),
00724                                    color->g(),
00725                                    color->b(),
00726                                    alpha);
00727       }
00728       error("not enough arguments for `change-color`", pstate);
00729       // unreachable
00730       return color;
00731     }
00732 
00733     template <size_t range>
00734     static double cap_channel(double c) {
00735       if      (c > range) return range;
00736       else if (c < 0)     return 0;
00737       else                return c;
00738     }
00739 
00740     Signature ie_hex_str_sig = "ie-hex-str($color)";
00741     BUILT_IN(ie_hex_str)
00742     {
00743       Color* c = ARG("$color", Color);
00744       double r = cap_channel<0xff>(c->r());
00745       double g = cap_channel<0xff>(c->g());
00746       double b = cap_channel<0xff>(c->b());
00747       double a = cap_channel<1>   (c->a()) * 255;
00748 
00749       stringstream ss;
00750       ss << '#' << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0');
00751       ss << std::hex << std::setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(std::floor(a+0.5));
00752       ss << std::hex << std::setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(std::floor(r+0.5));
00753       ss << std::hex << std::setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(std::floor(g+0.5));
00754       ss << std::hex << std::setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(std::floor(b+0.5));
00755 
00756       string result(ss.str());
00757       for (size_t i = 0, L = result.length(); i < L; ++i) {
00758         result[i] = std::toupper(result[i]);
00759       }
00760       return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, result);
00761     }

00767     Signature unquote_sig = "unquote($string)";
00768     BUILT_IN(sass_unquote)
00769     {
00770       AST_Node* arg = env["$string"];
00771       if (dynamic_cast<Null*>(arg)) {
00772         return new (ctx.mem) Null(pstate);
00773       }
00774       else if (String_Quoted* string_quoted = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(arg)) {
00775         String_Constant* result = new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, string_quoted->value());
00776         // remember if the string was quoted (color tokens)
00777         result->sass_fix_1291(string_quoted->quote_mark() != 0);
00778         return result;
00779       }
00780       To_String to_string(&ctx);
00781       return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, unquote(string(arg->perform(&to_string))));
00782     }
00783 
00784     Signature quote_sig = "quote($string)";
00785     BUILT_IN(sass_quote)
00786     {
00787       To_String to_string(&ctx);
00788       AST_Node* arg = env["$string"];
00789       string str(quote(arg->perform(&to_string), String_Constant::double_quote()));
00790       String_Constant* result = new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, str);
00791       result->is_delayed(true);
00792       return result;
00793     }

00796     Signature str_length_sig = "str-length($string)";
00797     BUILT_IN(str_length)
00798     {
00799       size_t len = string::npos;
00800       try {
00801         String_Constant* s = ARG("$string", String_Constant);
00802         len = UTF_8::code_point_count(s->value(), 0, s->value().size());
00803 
00804       }
00805       catch (utf8::invalid_code_point) {
00806         string msg("utf8::invalid_code_point");
00807         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00808       }
00809       catch (utf8::not_enough_room) {
00810         string msg("utf8::not_enough_room");
00811         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00812       }
00813       catch (utf8::invalid_utf8) {
00814         string msg("utf8::invalid_utf8");
00815         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00816       }
00817       catch (...) { throw; }
00818       // return something even if we had an error (-1)
00819       return new (ctx.mem) Number(pstate, len);
00820     }
00821 
00822     Signature str_insert_sig = "str-insert($string, $insert, $index)";
00823     BUILT_IN(str_insert)
00824     {
00825       string str;
00826       try {
00827         String_Constant* s = ARG("$string", String_Constant);
00828         str = s->value();
00829         str = unquote(str);
00830         String_Constant* i = ARG("$insert", String_Constant);
00831         string ins = i->value();
00832         ins = unquote(ins);
00833         Number* ind = ARG("$index", Number);
00834         double index = ind->value();
00835         size_t len = UTF_8::code_point_count(str, 0, str.size());
00836 
00837         if (index > 0 && index <= len) {
00838           // positive and within string length
00839           str.insert(UTF_8::offset_at_position(str, static_cast<size_t>(index) - 1), ins);
00840         }
00841         else if (index > len) {
00842           // positive and past string length
00843           str += ins;
00844         }
00845         else if (index == 0) {
00846           str = ins + str;
00847         }
00848         else if (std::abs(index) <= len) {
00849           // negative and within string length
00850           index += len + 1;
00851           str.insert(UTF_8::offset_at_position(str, static_cast<size_t>(index)), ins);
00852         }
00853         else {
00854           // negative and past string length
00855           str = ins + str;
00856         }
00857 
00858         if (String_Quoted* ss = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(s)) {
00859           if (ss->quote_mark()) str = quote(str);
00860         }
00861       }
00862       catch (utf8::invalid_code_point) {
00863         string msg("utf8::invalid_code_point");
00864         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00865       }
00866       catch (utf8::not_enough_room) {
00867         string msg("utf8::not_enough_room");
00868         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00869       }
00870       catch (utf8::invalid_utf8) {
00871         string msg("utf8::invalid_utf8");
00872         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00873       }
00874       catch (...) { throw; }
00875       return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, str);
00876     }
00877 
00878     Signature str_index_sig = "str-index($string, $substring)";
00879     BUILT_IN(str_index)
00880     {
00881       size_t index = string::npos;
00882       try {
00883         String_Constant* s = ARG("$string", String_Constant);
00884         String_Constant* t = ARG("$substring", String_Constant);
00885         string str = s->value();
00886         str = unquote(str);
00887         string substr = t->value();
00888         substr = unquote(substr);
00889 
00890         size_t c_index = str.find(substr);
00891         if(c_index == string::npos) {
00892           return new (ctx.mem) Null(pstate);
00893         }
00894         index = UTF_8::code_point_count(str, 0, c_index) + 1;
00895       }
00896       catch (utf8::invalid_code_point) {
00897         string msg("utf8::invalid_code_point");
00898         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00899       }
00900       catch (utf8::not_enough_room) {
00901         string msg("utf8::not_enough_room");
00902         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00903       }
00904       catch (utf8::invalid_utf8) {
00905         string msg("utf8::invalid_utf8");
00906         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00907       }
00908       catch (...) { throw; }
00909       // return something even if we had an error (-1)
00910       return new (ctx.mem) Number(pstate, index);
00911     }
00912 
00913     Signature str_slice_sig = "str-slice($string, $start-at, $end-at:-1)";
00914     BUILT_IN(str_slice)
00915     {
00916       string newstr;
00917       try {
00918         String_Constant* s = ARG("$string", String_Constant);
00919         double start_at = ARG("$start-at", Number)->value();
00920         double end_at = ARG("$end-at", Number)->value();
00921 
00922         string str = unquote(s->value());
00923 
00924         size_t size = utf8::distance(str.begin(), str.end());
00925         if (end_at <= size * -1.0) { end_at += size; }
00926         if (end_at < 0) { end_at += size + 1; }
00927         if (end_at > size) { end_at = size; }
00928         if (start_at < 0) { start_at += size + 1; }
00929         else if (start_at == 0) { ++ start_at; }
00930 
00931         if (start_at <= end_at)
00932         {
00933           string::iterator start = str.begin();
00934           utf8::advance(start, start_at - 1, str.end());
00935           string::iterator end = start;
00936           utf8::advance(end, end_at - start_at + 1, str.end());
00937           newstr = string(start, end);
00938         }
00939         if (String_Quoted* ss = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(s)) {
00940           if(ss->quote_mark()) newstr = quote(newstr);
00941         }
00942       }
00943       catch (utf8::invalid_code_point) {
00944         string msg("utf8::invalid_code_point");
00945         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00946       }
00947       catch (utf8::not_enough_room) {
00948         string msg("utf8::not_enough_room");
00949         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00950       }
00951       catch (utf8::invalid_utf8) {
00952         string msg("utf8::invalid_utf8");
00953         error(msg, pstate, backtrace);
00954       }
00955       catch (...) { throw; }
00956       return new (ctx.mem) String_Quoted(pstate, newstr);
00957     }
00958 
00959     Signature to_upper_case_sig = "to-upper-case($string)";
00960     BUILT_IN(to_upper_case)
00961     {
00962       String_Constant* s = ARG("$string", String_Constant);
00963       string str = s->value();
00964 
00965       for (size_t i = 0, L = str.length(); i < L; ++i) {
00966         if (Sass::Util::isAscii(str[i])) {
00967           str[i] = std::toupper(str[i]);
00968         }
00969       }
00970 
00971       if (String_Quoted* ss = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(s)) {
00972         str = ss->quote_mark() ? quote(str) : str;
00973       }
00974       return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, str);
00975     }
00976 
00977     Signature to_lower_case_sig = "to-lower-case($string)";
00978     BUILT_IN(to_lower_case)
00979     {
00980       String_Constant* s = ARG("$string", String_Constant);
00981       string str = s->value();
00982 
00983       for (size_t i = 0, L = str.length(); i < L; ++i) {
00984         if (Sass::Util::isAscii(str[i])) {
00985           str[i] = std::tolower(str[i]);
00986         }
00987       }
00988 
00989       if (String_Quoted* ss = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(s)) {
00990         str = ss->quote_mark() ? quote(str, '"') : str;
00991       }
00992       return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, str);
00993     }

01047     Signature min_sig = "min($numbers...)";
01048     BUILT_IN(min)
01049     {
01050       List* arglist = ARG("$numbers", List);
01051       Number* least = 0;
01052       for (size_t i = 0, L = arglist->length(); i < L; ++i) {
01053         Number* xi = dynamic_cast<Number*>(arglist->value_at_index(i));
01054         if (!xi) error("`" + string(sig) + "` only takes numeric arguments", pstate);
01055         if (least) {
01056           if (lt(xi, least, ctx)) least = xi;
01057         } else least = xi;
01058       }
01059       return least;
01060     }

01067       for (size_t i = 0, L = arglist->length(); i < L; ++i) {
01068         Number* xi = dynamic_cast<Number*>(arglist->value_at_index(i));
01069         if (!xi) error("`" + string(sig) + "` only takes numeric arguments", pstate);

01072         } else greatest = xi;

01077     Signature random_sig = "random($limit:false)";
01078     BUILT_IN(random)
01079     {
01080       Number* l = dynamic_cast<Number*>(env["$limit"]);
01081       if (l) {
01082         if (trunc(l->value()) != l->value() || l->value() == 0) error("argument $limit of `" + string(sig) + "` must be a positive integer", pstate);
01083         uniform_real_distribution<> distributor(1, l->value() + 1);
01084         uint_fast32_t distributed = static_cast<uint_fast32_t>(distributor(rand));
01085         return new (ctx.mem) Number(pstate, (double)distributed);
01086       }
01087       else {
01088         uniform_real_distribution<> distributor(0, 1);
01089         double distributed = static_cast<double>(distributor(rand));
01090         return new (ctx.mem) Number(pstate, distributed);
01091      }
01092     }

01105                                     map ? map->length() : 1);

01113     Signature nth_sig = "nth($list, $n)";
01114     BUILT_IN(nth)
01115     {
01116       Map* m = dynamic_cast<Map*>(env["$list"]);
01117       List* l = dynamic_cast<List*>(env["$list"]);
01118       Number* n = ARG("$n", Number);
01119       if (n->value() == 0) error("argument `$n` of `" + string(sig) + "` must be non-zero", pstate);
01120       // if the argument isn't a list, then wrap it in a singleton list
01121       if (!m && !l) {
01122         l = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01123         *l << ARG("$list", Expression);
01124       }
01125       size_t len = m ? m->length() : l->length();
01126       bool empty = m ? m->empty() : l->empty();
01127       if (empty) error("argument `$list` of `" + string(sig) + "` must not be empty", pstate);
01128       double index = std::floor(n->value() < 0 ? len + n->value() : n->value() - 1);
01129       if (index < 0 || index > len - 1) error("index out of bounds for `" + string(sig) + "`", pstate);
01130 
01131       if (m) {
01132         l = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01133         *l << m->keys()[static_cast<unsigned int>(index)];
01134         *l << m->at(m->keys()[static_cast<unsigned int>(index)]);
01135         return l;
01136       }
01137       else {
01138         return l->value_at_index(static_cast<int>(index));
01139       }
01140     }
01141 
01142     Signature set_nth_sig = "set-nth($list, $n, $value)";
01143     BUILT_IN(set_nth)
01144     {
01145       List* l = dynamic_cast<List*>(env["$list"]);
01146       Number* n = ARG("$n", Number);
01147       Expression* v = ARG("$value", Expression);
01148       if (!l) {
01149         l = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01150         *l << ARG("$list", Expression);
01151       }
01152       if (l->empty()) error("argument `$list` of `" + string(sig) + "` must not be empty", pstate);
01153       double index = std::floor(n->value() < 0 ? l->length() + n->value() : n->value() - 1);
01154       if (index < 0 || index > l->length() - 1) error("index out of bounds for `" + string(sig) + "`", pstate);
01155       List* result = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, l->length(), l->separator());
01156       for (size_t i = 0, L = l->length(); i < L; ++i) {
01157         *result << ((i == index) ? v : (*l)[i]);
01158       }
01159       return result;
01160     }

01162     Signature index_sig = "index($list, $value)";
01163     BUILT_IN(index)
01164     {
01165       List* l = dynamic_cast<List*>(env["$list"]);
01166       Expression* v = ARG("$value", Expression);
01167       if (!l) {
01168         l = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01169         *l << ARG("$list", Expression);
01170       }
01171       for (size_t i = 0, L = l->length(); i < L; ++i) {
01172         if (eq(l->value_at_index(i), v, ctx)) return new (ctx.mem) Number(pstate, i+1);
01173       }
01174       return new (ctx.mem) Null(pstate);
01175     }

01177     Signature join_sig = "join($list1, $list2, $separator: auto)";
01178     BUILT_IN(join)
01179     {
01180       List* l1 = dynamic_cast<List*>(env["$list1"]);
01181       List* l2 = dynamic_cast<List*>(env["$list2"]);
01182       String_Constant* sep = ARG("$separator", String_Constant);
01183       List::Separator sep_val = (l1 ? l1->separator() : List::SPACE);
01184       if (!l1) {
01185         l1 = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01186         *l1 << ARG("$list1", Expression);
01187         sep_val = (l2 ? l2->separator() : List::SPACE);
01188       }
01189       if (!l2) {
01190         l2 = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01191         *l2 << ARG("$list2", Expression);
01192       }
01193       size_t len = l1->length() + l2->length();
01194       string sep_str = unquote(sep->value());
01195       if (sep_str == "space") sep_val = List::SPACE;
01196       else if (sep_str == "comma") sep_val = List::COMMA;
01197       else if (sep_str != "auto") error("argument `$separator` of `" + string(sig) + "` must be `space`, `comma`, or `auto`", pstate);
01198       List* result = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, len, sep_val);
01199       *result += l1;
01200       *result += l2;
01201       return result;
01202     }

01204     Signature append_sig = "append($list, $val, $separator: auto)";
01205     BUILT_IN(append)
01206     {
01207       List* l = dynamic_cast<List*>(env["$list"]);
01208       Expression* v = ARG("$val", Expression);
01209       String_Constant* sep = ARG("$separator", String_Constant);
01210       if (!l) {
01211         l = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01212         *l << ARG("$list", Expression);
01213       }
01214       List* result = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, l->length() + 1, l->separator());
01215       string sep_str(unquote(sep->value()));
01216       if (sep_str == "space") result->separator(List::SPACE);
01217       else if (sep_str == "comma") result->separator(List::COMMA);
01218       else if (sep_str != "auto") error("argument `$separator` of `" + string(sig) + "` must be `space`, `comma`, or `auto`", pstate);
01219       *result += l;
01220       bool is_arglist = l->is_arglist();
01221       result->is_arglist(is_arglist);
01222       if (is_arglist) {
01223         *result << new (ctx.mem) Argument(v->pstate(),
01224                                           v,
01225                                           "",
01226                                           false,
01227                                           false);
01228 
01229       } else {
01230         *result << v;
01231       }
01232       return result;
01233     }

01235     Signature zip_sig = "zip($lists...)";
01236     BUILT_IN(zip)
01237     {
01238       List* arglist = new (ctx.mem) List(*ARG("$lists", List));
01239       size_t shortest = 0;
01240       for (size_t i = 0, L = arglist->length(); i < L; ++i) {
01241         List* ith = dynamic_cast<List*>(arglist->value_at_index(i));
01242         if (!ith) {
01243           ith = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, 1);
01244           *ith << arglist->value_at_index(i);
01245           if (arglist->is_arglist()) {
01246             ((Argument*)(*arglist)[i])->value(ith);
01247           } else {
01248             (*arglist)[i] = ith;
01249           }
01250         }
01251         shortest = (i ? std::min(shortest, ith->length()) : ith->length());
01252       }
01253       List* zippers = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, shortest, List::COMMA);
01254       size_t L = arglist->length();
01255       for (size_t i = 0; i < shortest; ++i) {
01256         List* zipper = new (ctx.mem) List(pstate, L);
01257         for (size_t j = 0; j < L; ++j) {
01258           *zipper << (*static_cast<List*>(arglist->value_at_index(j)))[i];
01259         }
01260         *zippers << zipper;
01261       }
01262       return zippers;
01263     }

01274                                            l->separator() == List::COMMA ? "comma" : "space");

01337     Signature map_remove_sig = "map-remove($map, $keys...)";
01338     BUILT_IN(map_remove)
01339     {
01340       bool remove;
01341       Map* m = ARGM("$map", Map, ctx);
01342       List* arglist = ARG("$keys", List);
01343       Map* result = new (ctx.mem) Map(pstate, 1);
01344       for (auto key : m->keys()) {
01345         remove = false;
01346         for (size_t j = 0, K = arglist->length(); j < K && !remove; ++j) {
01347           remove = eq(key, arglist->value_at_index(j), ctx);
01348         }
01349         if (!remove) *result << make_pair(key, m->at(key));
01350       }
01351       return result;
01352     }

01356     {

01360         string name = string(((Argument*)(*arglist)[i])->name());
01361         name = name.erase(0, 1); // sanitize name (remove dollar sign)
01362         *result << make_pair(new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, name),
01363                              ((Argument*)(*arglist)[i])->value());
01364       }
01365       return result;

01395     BUILT_IN(comparable)
01396     {
01397       Number* n1 = ARG("$number-1", Number);
01398       Number* n2 = ARG("$number-2", Number);
01399       if (n1->is_unitless() || n2->is_unitless()) {
01400         return new (ctx.mem) Boolean(pstate, true);
01401       }
01402       Number tmp_n2(*n2);
01403       tmp_n2.normalize(n1->find_convertible_unit());
01404       return new (ctx.mem) Boolean(pstate, n1->unit() == tmp_n2.unit());
01405     }

01472     Signature call_sig = "call($name, $args...)";
01473     BUILT_IN(call)
01474     {
01475       string name = Util::normalize_underscores(unquote(ARG("$name", String_Constant)->value()));
01476       List* arglist = new (ctx.mem) List(*ARG("$args", List));
01477 
01478       Arguments* args = new (ctx.mem) Arguments(pstate);
01479       for (size_t i = 0, L = arglist->length(); i < L; ++i) {
01480         Expression* expr = arglist->value_at_index(i);
01481         if (arglist->is_arglist()) {
01482           Argument* arg = static_cast<Argument*>((*arglist)[i]);
01483           *args << new (ctx.mem) Argument(pstate,
01484                                           expr,
01485                                           "",
01486                                           arg->is_rest_argument(),
01487                                           arg->is_keyword_argument());
01488         } else {
01489           *args << new (ctx.mem) Argument(pstate, expr);
01490         }
01491       }
01492       Function_Call* func = new (ctx.mem) Function_Call(pstate, name, args);
01493       Contextualize contextualize(ctx, &d_env, backtrace);
01494       Listize listize(ctx);
01495       Eval eval(ctx, &contextualize, &listize, &d_env, backtrace);
01496       return func->perform(&eval);
01497 
01498     }

01508     Signature if_sig = "if($condition, $if-true, $if-false)";
01509     // BUILT_IN(sass_if)
01510     // { return ARG("$condition", Expression)->is_false() ? ARG("$if-false", Expression) : ARG("$if-true", Expression); }
01511     BUILT_IN(sass_if)
01512     {
01513       Contextualize contextualize(ctx, &d_env, backtrace);
01514       Listize listize(ctx);
01515       Eval eval(ctx, &contextualize, &listize, &d_env, backtrace);
01516       bool is_true = !ARG("$condition", Expression)->perform(&eval)->is_false();
01517       if (is_true) {
01518         return ARG("$if-true", Expression)->perform(&eval);
01519       }
01520       else {
01521         return ARG("$if-false", Expression)->perform(&eval);
01522       }
01523     }

01540     Signature inspect_sig = "inspect($value)";
01541     BUILT_IN(inspect)
01542     {
01543       Expression* v = ARG("$value", Expression);
01544       if (v->concrete_type() == Expression::NULL_VAL) {
01545         return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, "null");
01546       } else if (v->concrete_type() == Expression::BOOLEAN && *v == 0) {
01547         return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, "false");
01548       } else if (v->concrete_type() == Expression::STRING) {
01549         return v;
01550       } else {
01551         bool parentheses = v->concrete_type() == Expression::MAP ||
01552                            v->concrete_type() == Expression::LIST;
01553         Output_Style old_style;
01554         old_style = ctx.output_style;
01555         ctx.output_style = NESTED;
01556         To_String to_string(&ctx, false);
01557         string inspect = v->perform(&to_string);
01558         if (inspect.empty() && parentheses) inspect = "()";
01559         ctx.output_style = old_style;
01560         return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, inspect);
01561 
01562 
01563       }
01564       // return v;
01565     }
01566 
01567     Signature is_superselector_sig = "is-superselector($super, $sub)";
01568     BUILT_IN(is_superselector)
01569     {
01570       To_String to_string(&ctx, false);
01571       Expression*  ex_sup = ARG("$super", Expression);
01572       Expression*  ex_sub = ARG("$sub", Expression);
01573       string sup_src = ex_sup->perform(&to_string) + "{";
01574       string sub_src = ex_sub->perform(&to_string) + "{";
01575       Selector_List* sel_sup = Parser::parse_selector(sup_src.c_str(), ctx);
01576       Selector_List* sel_sub = Parser::parse_selector(sub_src.c_str(), ctx);
01577       bool result = sel_sup->is_superselector_of(sel_sub);
01578       return new (ctx.mem) Boolean(pstate, result);
01579     }

01581     Signature unique_id_sig = "unique-id()";
01582     BUILT_IN(unique_id)
01583     {
01584       std::stringstream ss;
01585       uniform_real_distribution<> distributor(0, 4294967296); // 16^8
01586       uint_fast32_t distributed = static_cast<uint_fast32_t>(distributor(rand));
01587       ss << "u" << setfill('0') << setw(8) << std::hex << distributed;
01588       return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(pstate, ss.str());
01589     }
